website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you don't want to spend too much money but prefer a larger TV with exceptionally detailed images.
pros: Stands out for its ultra high definition that brings action to life with its exceptional 3840 by 2160 resolution – beautiful picture quality for a reasonable price
Includes 3 HDMI inputs to further customize your viewing experience
cons: Reported issues of remote control code not working with compatible remotes
Customer service is not very attentive

website_summaries.verdict: By far the best TV if you want a budget-friendly option with gorgeous picture quality that is surprising considering the low price.
pros: Offers the latest technology in images – ultra high definition (UHD) 4K resolution that delivers unbeatable picture quality
Lightweight and easy to wall mount – an all-around sound deal
cons: Not the most attentive customer service
Some reports of slower than expected delivery
The remote control is confusing to program
Not a "smart" model, but for the price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality was terrible; return or do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this TV to replace an old hand-me-down Samsung TV that I’ve used in my gaming setup while at college for 3 years now. From the way the product was advertised, I thought that it would offer a far improved picture quality than my current TV. Got it from my campus’ post office and went through the pain of setting up the legs that it balances only to find that the picture quality was horrible. What should be 1080p resolution comes out as a poorly colored, pixelated mess even with adjustments. Do not waist your money on this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As It Looks
customer_reviews.text: Photo shows DVD insertion and ejection at SIDE EDGE of unit, but the slot is actually well behind the edge on the back at about the 1/3 point of the unit width. As such, if the unit is mounted on a wall, one cannot easily insert or recover a DVD. Sound quality is poor, so auxiliary speakers are essential for adequate quality and volume. Packaging for shipment was inadequate to prevent damage to the DVD eject mechanism from a likely package drop on the opposite side edge. Picture quality is very good. However, the edge frame obscures a small portion of the DVD image all around, so some DVD graphics near the edge on the original do not show properly.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa Jim

customer_reviews.title: Beware! See photo.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the DVD player and it works great. BUT, when we decided to get cable TV, there was nothing to hook the coax cable to. We are so upset. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Ballakri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cheap and nice but the headphone jack was busted - it produces a buzzing sound over the regular audio
customer_reviews.author: M Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good picture, poor sound
customer_reviews.text: Picture has too much total black in it - cannot see different grays. Sound quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: john_pa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Fizzled out.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this TV. Purchased August 9th 2018. Lasted 1year and 9 months before the picture went black. Hasn’t worked since. Cheaply made. Only has one port so if you have cable, you won’t be able to hook up your home security system or amazon fire stick. Very disappointed. Look elsewhere. Spend more, get more.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture - clear and crisp
customer_reviews.text: I love the built in DVD player. Mom is in assisted living and it is so easy to pop in a DVD for her to watch
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: tried to connect antenna to receptacle and it came off
customer_reviews.author: DHDF

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are no good but the picture is fine
customer_reviews.author: carlus hannah

customer_reviews.title: The size was nice since he was a shared dorm room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to take to college. The size was nice since he was a shared dorm room. He says it works as advertised, mainly uses for his PlayStation 4
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: The price is right for the size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very clear . But the unit is hard to mount on the supplied stand.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA KAPLAN

customer_reviews.title: TV has a great picture but can not operate the remote for Directv
customer_reviews.text: TV has a great picture but can not operate the remote for Directv. There is no code to enter.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Wallace

customer_reviews.title: The TV picture quality is not good. Being in touch with Curtis International about the ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV picture quality is not good. Being in touch with Curtis International about the TV. The reference is CF 1226171504. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Y.

customer_reviews.title: It had a horrible picture and the box had walmart
customer_reviews.text: I returned this the 50 inch RCA HD TV. It is not a 4k2k Ultra HD TV as advertised. It had a horrible picture and the box had walmart.com stickers on them. The seller knows that this is NOT a 4k2k TV and is still advertising it as such. You can't buy a 50 inch 4k2k tv for 3 hundo.... aint going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV's sound
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when I hit the on button on the remote, the TV comes on with picture but no sound. I turn off the remote, wait a minute, and turn it back on and then I have sound. It didn't do it at first but started doing it a couple of months after I purchased the TV.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv.
customer_reviews.text: I like to have a tv in my craft room.
customer_reviews.author: melodee

customer_reviews.title: Misleading rating for 43" rca
customer_reviews.text: This 2.7 review rating is misleading. I'm seeing ratings for a TV DVD combo which this 43"tv isn't. Also seeing 50" TV ratings etc. This is good TV and to get ratings of other TV's that aren't good isn't fair to the mfg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture good...sound not so much!
customer_reviews.text: When we saw this TV in a 'store' it looked and sounded great! Purchased and took home only to find that the sound was like it was from a transistor radio! Back to see it in the store only to detect that the sound was coming from an alternate source (small soundbar) which I since purchased for $50. So, at the end of the day, beware and also purchase a soundbar if this is your choice. RCA has always been deemed a premium TV when I was young so, where did they drop the ball?
customer_reviews.author: David E. Pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Can't get the right one.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd RCA 40 in that I have ordered. I need a bio screen with built in DVD player for my disabled client that lives in my home. I received the first one and it did not have DVD player built Sent it back. Received another one and it have no parts. No remote, instruction booklet or legs. Sent it back and now I received this one and I get it all put together and turn it on and there is a huge gash in the screen. Sending this one back. I just do not understand why I can not get a working 40 in RCA with built in DVD player.I guess it is time to change brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an RCA TV. What a mistake. I needed manufacture support and called the help line for RCA and was told that the phone service for RCA TV's had closed and that I had to email them with my question. I couldn't believe this and called on three separate occasions and was told the same thing, that phone service wasn't available. 4 days later no one has answered my three emails. Frustration! I returned the TV and purchased another brand that has a good reputation for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RCA RLED4945-UHD 49-Inch 4k Ultra HD LED TV
product_meta.description: Size:4K UHD, 49-InchThe RCA 49" 4K Ultra HD TV has resolution that is four times that of Full HD. The result? Breathtaking clarity and fine picture details that will amaze, even when viewed up close. This RCA TV supports High Dynamic Range content, so it can display HDR movies that have been specially mastered to reveal more colors and more detail for a more cinematic image.
feature_bullets: Connections: HDMI, YPbPR, AV audio/video, Line out,Optical out, RF
Aspect ratio 16:9 Resolution: 3840 x2160 Response time: 8 ms Refresh rate: 60 Hz
